text: Mohammadreza Golzar (, born March 21, 1977) is an Iranian actor, singer and model. Golzar began his career in 1998 as a guitarist in the Aryan music band. Sometime later, he made his acting debut in the film Sam and Narges (1990), directed by Iraj Ghaderi. https://jamejamonline.ir/fa/news/667990 ==References== * * * * Mohammad Reza Golzar on Spotify Category:Iranian actors Category:1977 births Category:Living people
title: Mohammadreza Golzar
